title: Control Structures
description: In this chapter, you will learn about the control structures of the JavaScript language: branches, loops, and catching exceptions. The chapter also gives an overview of JavaScript statements and describes the process of automatic semicolon insertion.

courses.title: Expressions, Statements, Semicolons
courses.description: In this scenario, you will study the difference between expressions and statements, as well as the rules for semicolon insertion.

courses.title: Comparisons, Boolean Operators, Boolishness
courses.description: In this scenario, you will learn how to work effectively with Boolean values (true/false) in JavaScript, and how to avoid the foolishness of unrestrained Boolean conversions.
